1{-# LANGUAGE OverloadedStrings #-}
2{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
3
4-- | Abort reasons.
5
6module Koshucode.Baala.Base.Abort.Reason
7  ( -- * Data type
8    AbortReason (..),
9    AbortTag,
10    CodePosInfo,
11    abortPointUp,
12
13    -- * Derived type
14    Ab, AbMap, MapAb, AbManyMap,
15    AbTest, IOAb, BinAb,
16  
17    -- * Creation
18    abortBecause, abortLine, abortLines, abortPage,
19    leftBecause, leftLine, leftLines, leftPage,
20
21    -- * Alteration
22    Abortable,
23    abortable,
24    unabort,
25  ) where
26
27import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Overture             as O
28import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.List            as B
29import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Base.Abort.CodePos   as B
30
31
32-- --------------------------------------------  Type
33
34-- | Abort reason.
35data AbortReason = AbortReason
36    { abortReason :: String        -- ^ Reason in one line
37    , abortDetail :: [String]      -- ^ Detailed description
38    , abortNote   :: [String]      -- ^ Additional notes for long description
39    , abortPoint  :: [CodePosInfo] -- ^ Tag and aborting points
40    } deriving (Show, Eq, Ord)
41
42-- | Tag on aborting point.
43type AbortTag = String
44
45-- | Source code position information.
46type CodePosInfo = (B.CodePos, AbortTag)
47
48-- | Upward aborting points, i.e., from callee to caller.
49abortPointUp :: AbortReason -> [CodePosInfo]
50abortPointUp = reverse . B.unique . abortPoint
51
52
53-- --------------------------------------------  Deriving type
54
55-- | Abortable result, i.e., either of right result or abort reason.
56type Ab a = Either AbortReason a
57
58-- | Abortable mapping.
59type AbMap a = a -> Ab a
60
61-- | Abortable-to-abortable mapping.
62type MapAb a = Ab a -> Ab a
63
64-- | Abortable many map.
65type AbManyMap a = a -> Ab [a]
66
67-- | Abortable Boolean-valued function.
68type AbTest a = a -> Ab Bool
69
70-- | Abortable I/O.
71type IOAb a = IO (Ab a)
72
73-- | Type for abortable binary operators.
74type BinAb a = a -> a -> Ab a
75
76
77-- --------------------------------------------  Creation
78
79tReason :: (O.Textual s, O.Textual t) => s -> [t] -> [t] -> [CodePosInfo] -> AbortReason
80tReason r ds ns = AbortReason r' ds' ns' where
81    r'  = O.tString r
82    ds' = O.tString <$> ds
83    ns' = O.tString <$> ns
84
85-- | Construct abort reason with reason text.
86abortBecause :: (O.Textual s) => s -> AbortReason
87abortBecause r = tReason r ([] :: [String]) [] []
88
89-- | Construct abort reason with reason and detailed text.
90abortLine :: (O.Textual s, O.Textual t) => s -> t -> AbortReason
91abortLine r d = abortLines r [d]
92
93-- | Construct abort reason with reason and multilined detailed text.
94abortLines :: (O.Textual s, O.Textual t) => s -> [t] -> AbortReason
95abortLines r ds = tReason r ds [] []
96
97-- | Construct abort reason with reason and note.
98abortPage :: (O.Textual s, O.Textual t) => s -> [t] -> AbortReason
99abortPage r ns = tReason r [] ns []
100
101-- | 'Left' plus 'abortBecause'.
102leftBecause :: (O.Textual s) => s -> Ab a
103leftBecause r = Left $ abortBecause r
104
105-- | 'Left' plus 'abortLine'.
106leftLine :: (O.Textual s, O.Textual t) => s -> t -> Ab a
107leftLine r d = Left $ abortLine r d
108
109-- | 'Left' plus 'abortLines'.
110leftLines :: (O.Textual s, O.Textual t) => s -> [t] -> Ab a
111leftLines r ds = Left $ abortLines r ds
112
113-- | 'Left' plus 'abortPage'.
114leftPage :: (O.Textual s, O.Textual t) => s -> [t] -> Ab a
115leftPage r ns = Left $ abortPage r ns
116
117
118-- --------------------------------------------  Alteration
119
120-- | Abortable process.
121type Abortable cp b = cp -> MapAb b
122
123-- | Push source information when process is aborted.
124abortable :: (B.GetCodePos cp) => AbortTag -> Abortable cp b
125abortable tag cp = either (Left . push tag (B.getCPs cp)) Right
126
127push :: AbortTag -> [B.CodePos] -> O.Map AbortReason
128push _ [] a = a
129push tag (cp : _) a@AbortReason { abortPoint = ps } =
130    a { abortPoint = (cp, tag) : ps }
131
132-- | Extract right value or print error message.
133unabort :: Ab a -> a
134unabort (Right a)  = a
135unabort (Left a)   = error $ abortReason a
